mapper.select: SELECT par_id ,par_name FROM partition_info WHERE evd_id = #{evd_id} order by par_name asc

select a.file_id as id, a.name, a.dir_type, a.size, a.md5, a.extension, a.id as seq , FROM_UNIXTIME(a.ctime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as ctime , a.ctime_nano as ctime_nano , FROM_UNIXTIME(a.atime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as atime , a.atime_nano as atime_nano , FROM_UNIXTIME(a.mtime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as mtime , a.mtime_nano as mtime_nano , FROM_UNIXTIME(a.etime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as etime , a.etime_nano as etime_nano from file_info a, partition_info b where a.parent_id = #{id} and b.evd_id = #{evd_id} and (a.dir_type = 3 or a.dir_type = 5) and a.par_id = b.par_id order by a.dir_type, a.name

select FROM_UNIXTIME(fn_mtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as name, count(*) as value from ( with recursive cte (file_id, name, parent_id, dir_type, fn_mtime) as ( select file_id, name, parent_id, dir_type, fn_mtime from file_info where parent_id = #{id} union all select p.file_id, p.name, p.parent_id, p.dir_type, p.fn_mtime from file_info p inner join cte on p.parent_id = cte.file_id ) select * from cte ) a group by FROM_UNIXTIME(fn_mtime, '%Y-%m-%d')
